title: I'm not getting my IP turned into BP, and not getting Preseason 8, how come?
body: I do live in Korea, but plays on the NA sever, and i'm not getting any IP turned into BP. Also, the preseason did not start. It is still patch 7.21. How come this happens?

replies.body:
Just because you like the otherside of the world than the server doesnt mean that it is done at your time.
When something states Local Time they mean Local to the server.... which for NA is PDT.

NA is down for another few hours and after them few hours the pre-season patch will hit and you will get your things.

Sounds like the NA server just hadn't patched yet, which is why you hadn't seen any conversions yet. Now that the patch has dropped, make sure you play a game to complete the missions which will start the conversion. Then you do still need to open the capsules you'll get in your Loot!
Plz leave anything on this and tell me why
Cause the NA server has not been updated.{{item:3151}}
hey and tell me how long these things need to be waited for an answer{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
